verbs.description: [ARG0: The governors of Delaware , Pennsylvania and New Jersey] [V: say] [ARG1: they refuse to send troops or other state resources to the border because of President Trump 's immigrant family separation policy] .

The governors of Delaware , Pennsylvania and New Jersey say [ARG0: they] [V: refuse] [ARG1: to send troops or other state resources to the border] [ARGM-CAU: because of President Trump 's immigrant family separation policy] .

The governors of Delaware , Pennsylvania and New Jersey say [ARG0: they] refuse to [V: send] [ARG1: troops or other state resources] [ARG2: to the border] because of President Trump 's immigrant family separation policy .
